text: Andrew Tait was a Scottish football player during the late 1940s / early 1950s. He signed 'senior' with Dumbarton in December 1949 and was a regular in the team for four seasons. He signed for Dundee United in September 1953. == References == == External links == Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Dundee United F.C. players Category:Clyde F.C. players Category:Albion Rovers F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Association football wing halves Category:Year of birth missing
title: Andy Tait
